ingredients.Savory Pesto Quinoa Bowl: eggs,quinoa,avocado,pesto,hemp seeds,chia seeds,basil,kale,nutritional yeast,pine nuts,garlic,lemon juice
ingredients.Mushroom millet risotto: vegan butter,white onion,garlic,button mushrooms,quinoa/risotto rice,veg stock,parmesan,spinach
ingredients.Vegan Tomato Risotto with Roasted Veg: olive oil, cherry tomatoes, red bell peppers, zucchini, red onion, garlic cloves, risotto rice, balsamic vinegar, tomato, vegetable stock, sun dried tomatoes, basil, vegan parmesan
ingredients.Vegan Risotto with asparagus and peas: vegetable broth, olive oil,yellow onion, garlic, arborio rice/risotto rice, white wine dry, lemon juice, asparagus, frozen peas, vegan butter, vegan parmesan cheese
ingredients.Rosemary Mushroom Risotto: veg broth, vegan butter, shitake mushrooms, onion, garlic, rosemary, nutritional yeast, risotto rice, dry white wine, dijon mustard, white miso, vegan parmesan, [optional] frozen peas, fava beans, asparagus tips
ingredients.Amaranth Risotto: shiitake mushrooms, onion,garlic,dried thyme, amaranth,veg broth,lemon juice,lemon peel
